full_summary:
(Tender Announcement)

# Title
3 SharePoint Online Developers (Level 3) - Task-based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Requirement

## Notice Reference Information

* Notice Reference Number: W6952-25-0001
* Date of Notice Publication: April 16, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 3, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2024

## Background
This tender announcement is for a Task-based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) requirement for the Department of National Defence. The contract is set aside for Indigenous Business under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

## Scope of Work
The successful contractor will provide the services of three (3) Level 3 Programmer/Developer to assist with the configuration and development of the D365 environment for SharePoint Online (SPO) and the compliance and security center. The resources will also assist with the identification, configuration, and implementation of Microsoft 365 (M365) and Azure components, as well as provide support for in-house development and the consideration of third-party tools.

## Requirements

* Level of Security Requirement: Company Minimum Security: secret and Resource Minimum Security: secret
* Estimated Level of Effort: 100 working days for each resource
* Proposed Period of Contract: June 1st, 2024 – October 31st, 2024

## Evaluation Criteria
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Pre-Qualification

This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-170432/B who qualify under the following streams:
* Stream 1: Application Services
* Category: A.6 Programmer/Developer
* Level of Expertise: Level 3

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or further information regarding this tender announcement, please contact:
* Liam O'Toole
* Phone: 613794822
* Email: liam.o’toole@forces.gc.ca

## Posting Details
This tender has expired.  ( -appelOffresStatut-fr Expiré ) -appelOffresStatut-eng Expired
